summary: Fiji is an island country in the South Pacific Ocean, made up of over 330 islands. Most people live on the two biggest islands, Viti Levu and Vanua Levu. Humans have lived there since ancient times, and Europeans first visited in the 17th century. Fiji was a British colony before gaining independence in 1970. It became a republic in 1987 after several coups. Today, Fiji has a strong economy thanks to tourism, farming, and fishing. Its capital is Suva, and its currency is the Fijian dollar.
title: Fiji
